content: It probably says more about Mr Pence’s internal compass as anything else. One might be tempted to, um, let’s call it ‘stray’ if one does not possess the internal standards that separate “a meal” from “a date” from “a conquest.” I would bet the Vice President does not have those urges, though. My guess is he wants to seem pious and religious, so he keeps up this outward strict almost-Puritanistic code of behavior. The downside, as you mention, is that female journalists would be limited in access. And photos like the one shown show only middle-aged males at the event. The optics suck, Mr. Vice President.
